description: A way for users to apply roles to themselves
Commands that you can configure to respond with whatever you want
Create custom embeds that are sent by Wynem and say whatever you want

name: Auto-responses
description: A way to make Wynem respond to triggers in regular messages
Get and view textures from Minecraft versions or resource packs
Easily view the issues from a GitHub repository in your server
Add Wynem's automod templates to the server
Add a channel where messages are sent after they reach a certain number of a reaction, usually a star.
Add your server's rules into Wynem so that you can easily list them all, individually quote rules, and create a stylised rules message for your rules channel.
A system that allows users to create private tickets, that get assigned and handled by users with a special role.
